content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. I received a message to list files in the current directory and returned a list of files including 'atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', and many others.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "adventures.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Today, I decided not to turn a river into a lake. Instead, I will focus on exploring the world through other means.\n\nPlans:\n- Explore the world through other means, such as hiking, camping, and kayaking\n- Document my adventures through writing and photography\n- Share my experiences with others to inspire them to explore the world in a responsible way', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best kayaking destinations in the world"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.aworldtotravel.com/best-places-to-kayak-around-the-world/", "https://www.seakayakadventures.com/blog/top-sea-kayaking-spots-world", "https://www.oars.com/blog/10-best-sea-kayaking-spots-world/", "https://www.wanderlust.co.uk/content/pick-of-the-paddles-sea-kayaking/", "https://www.redbull.com/int-en/best-kayaking-holidays", "https://www.unbound.travel/blog/worlds-best-sea-kayaking-destinations", "https://blog.windstarcruises.com/best-places-kayak-in-the-world/", "https://www.travelinglifestyle.net/top-stunning-places-kayak-around-world/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.aworldtotravel.com/best-places-to-kayak-around-the-world/", "question": "What are some of the best kayaking destinations listed on the website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a list of 20 kayaking destinations around the world, including Glacier Bay in Alaska, the Amazon River in South America, the Dalmatian Coast in Croatia, Patagonia in Chile, Na Pali Coast in Hawaii, Fiordland in New Zealand, the Norwegian Fjords in Norway, the Sea of Cortez in Mexico, the Galápagos Islands in Ecuador, Lake Malawi in Malawi, Halong Bay in Vietnam, Ningaloo Reef in Australia, Antelope Canyon in Arizona, the Soča River in Slovenia, Vancouver Island in Canada, Crystal River in Florida, Phang Nga Bay in Thailand, the Okavango Delta in Botswana, Vava’u in Tonga, and the San Juan Islands in Washington.\n\nLinks: ['SUSTAINABILITY (https://www.aworldtotravel.com/sustainability/)', 'LIFESTYLE (https://www.aworldtotravel.com/lifestyle/)', 'MAP (https://www.aworldtotravel.com/map/)', 'PLACES (https://www.aworldtotravel.com/places/)', 'RESOURCES (https://www.aworldtotravel.com/resources/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
